fetching_integrations.name: Cortex Xpanse

action.existing:
Update your current instance to work with the new Xpanse incident type: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident type field to Xpanse Issue - Generic. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'ExpanseV2 Mapper'.
action.new:
Set up new 'Cortex Xpanse' instance to start fetching Cortex Xpanse incidents: 
1. Enable fetching. 
2. Set the Incident type field to Xpanse Issue - Generic. 
3. Set the Mapper field to 'ExpanseV2 Mapper'.
